game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a group of bandits who have taken over the old windmill on the outskirts of town. They have been terrorizing travelers and locals alike, and the villagers are too afraid to do anything about it.
game.objective: Clear out the bandits from the old windmill and bring back their leader's sword as proof of your victory.

tasks.description: Speak to the villagers to gather information about the bandits and their movements.
Infiltrate the old windmill and take out as many bandits as you can without alerting their leader.
Confront the bandit leader, Grimgar Ironfist, and defeat him in combat to claim his sword as proof of your victory.
tasks.objective: Defeat Grimgar Ironfist and take his sword

game.title: Bandits at the Windmill
